sentence: On a sour note the restrooms in the self parking garage lobby is in need of better upkeep
Harahs is an older casino and needs to update hotel rooms
I called back again because I had plans to meet up with friends and could nt stay in the room much longer and they told me the maintenance person had 2 rooms ahead of me
Well actually I had a knock on my door at 1230 one night and it was from maintenance saying they would fix my tv which was working

The liability company clearly told me that plumbing repair work had to be done due to the fact that the pipe was leaking and that they did have to repair that issue but because it was not previously reported my injuries do not matter
Our room was in the marina section was very old and needed to be updated
After 2nd time my key did not work I had security let me in and then front desk sent up locksmith to repair entrance card key

The rooms need some cleaning and updating since it was the most deplorable condition however after dinner and gambiling and returning very very late it was too late to switch or we would have demanded it
The room could have used some repairs and the shower was cold
The pool was being renovated but we had no intention of swimming anyway so that was not an issue
There is a newly renovated club The Pool for nightlife and of course all the slot machines and tables you could ask for
Love the newly renovated section
The renovated room was done tastefully and was being kept clean
Our room was newly renovated and looked clean and fresh
Newly renovated clean room super friendly staff willing to put up with your silly questions and an all inclusive spa onsite
Three night stay in renovated Bay View Tower
This trip per request we stayed in the newly renovated Coastal Tower and found it to be clean and pleasant
Rooms otherwise especially the newly renovated ones are very nice and roomy
needs a makeover but met out needs for our stay The pool was beautiful and fun
The hotel itself and staff are both in need of repair
